sentences.english: Because different worms live in different strata, or portions of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 不同的蚯蚓居住在不同的土壤層。

sentences.english: Earthworms play a vital role in food production.
sentences.chinese: 在糧食生產方面，蚯蚓扮演極爲重要的作用。

sentences.english: And the wormcast was used in the experiment group.
sentences.chinese: 處理組以蚯蚓糞爲墊料。

sentences.english: They prefer to eat earthworms and seeds on the forest floor.
sentences.chinese: 它們喜歡喫森林裏面的蚯蚓和種子。

sentences.english: Earthworms and other essential soil organisms are extremely susceptive to cadmium poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓和其他主要的土壤生物都非常容易鎘中毒。

sentences.english: That chick pecks out an earthworm from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 那隻小雞從土裏啄出一條蚯蚓。

sentences.english: Worms reject the finer particles when feeding.
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓取食時丟棄了較細的顆粒。

sentences.english: Earthworms have been eaten to cure impotency .
There are several other excretory mechanisms in earthworms .
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓有好幾種排泄機制。

sentences.english: He is baiting the fish hook with bait made from earthworms.
sentences.chinese: 他在魚鉤上掛上用蚯蚓製成的魚食做誘餌。

sentences.english: An earthworm is a terricolous organism .
Tianjin China Liming Jia Earthworm Farm CO. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 中國天津賈立明蚯蚓養殖有限公司。

sentences.english: Because earthworms are as biologically complex as any insect.
sentences.chinese: 因爲蚯蚓和其他昆蟲一樣有着一套完整的生物學構造。

sentences.english: Earthworms have been used in testing pregnancy .
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓被用於妊娠反應試驗。

sentences.english: The hen raked up an earthworm.

definition: Asian swamp eel (Monopterus albus)/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
